Name: 100 hidden hares
About the game: Art by ﾐ人exandr Telminov Important information Press 'N' for night mode. Press 'Del' then 'Esc' to reset all achievements. 100 hidden hares is a hidden object game in the winter setting. Black and white hand-drawn graphics in a cartoon style. Ultra hard! Very difficult! Can you find 100 hares? Just click on the hare! Take care of your nerves!
